description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, and sets up an agent to generate movie scripts based on a prompt.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent instance to print the response content based on a prompt.
